description: Describes a bulk thing provisioning task. Requires permission to access the DescribeThingRegistrationTask action.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the task was last modified.

nested_items.name: inputFileBucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket that contains the input file.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The role ARN that grants access to the input file bucket.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the bulk thing provisioning task.

nested_items.name: successCount
nested_items.description: The number of things successfully provisioned.

nested_items.name: failureCount
nested_items.description: The number of things that failed to be provisioned.

nested_items.name: percentageProgress
nested_items.description: The progress of the bulk provisioning task expressed as a percentage.
